title: Infinite Loop of crashing
body: So I start up league of legends and then I immediately get a bugsplat error message and then the client restarts and then another bugsplat message, this happens over and over again, I'm finding it irritating and I can't seem to figure out what wrong. Any resolutions to this?

replies.body: This is probably being caused by Discord Overlay.  Disabling this should solve it!
I have the same issue, and turning off Discord Overlay does not solve it.

Same for me, I can't even open Discord anyways atm... This thing has been going on for a bit, kinda annoying. I hope to find a fix else its going to be the end of my playtime and money spent on this cr*p.
